content: None of this really surprises me. I’d never sought it out but I figured there’d be a bunch of people coalesce around defending bald guys from the stupid attacks of a few superficially minded people. Seems hardly worth it to me. I’d rather not be bald. I’d have rather not gone bald at age 21. I’d rather not have developed a carpet of body hair on my chest at age 15, and on my back at age 17. But I’d rather laugh than cry though. One very special and witty woman said to me in the morning after our first night together that I had hair everywhere she didn’t, and that she had hair everywhere I didn’t.
